ai-patthana18.23:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.23:0.3_0: robes for the sake of self-developing, etc., are for the sake of the robes,
ai-patthana18.23:1.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.23:2.1_0: for it’s not only because of defilement and cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.23:2.1_3: What four trivial trees have been uneven.
ai-patthana18.23:2.1_4: This is the section in brief.
